headers.access-control-expose-headers: ETag, Link, Location, Retry-After, X-GitHub-OTP, X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Used, X-RateLimit-Resource, X-RateLimit-Reset, X-OAuth-Scopes, X-Accepted-OAuth-Scopes, X-Poll-Interval, X-GitHub-Media-Type, X-GitHub-SSO, X-GitHub-Request-Id, Deprecation, Sunset

issueOrPullRequest.body:
### Please read this first

- **Have you read the custom model provider docs, including the 'Common issues' section?** [Model provider docs](https://openai.github.io/openai-agents-python/models/#using-other-llm-providers) Yes
- **Have you searched for related issues?** Others may have faced similar issues. Yes

### Describe the question
Although `preserve_thinking_tokens` is a param for `Converter.items_to_messages`, it doesn't attach the thinking tokens unless there was a tool call.

I have a fix for this in a local branch with tests but I don't have permission to push the branch up. 

### Debug information
- Agents SDK version: v0.6.3
- Python version: 3.12

### Repro steps
Enable thinking for Anthropic models using LitellmModel.

### Expected behavior
Thinking tokens are attached to the assistant message.
issueOrPullRequest.title: Thinking tokens are not attached in between turns to Claude with extended thinking
